# Delete a function

Learn how to delete a function.

1.  Navigate to in the left navigation menu.
2.  Locate the function you want to delete.
3.  Click the more options icon ![More action icon](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/9d293d31-4491-421c-b4d6-f5a49e5f13c3?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..ocXaJIVwR2pLXjq8UisJ7hREJYyWWKEy7GApw1z8fOU) and then click Delete. A confirmation dialog is displayed.
4.  Click Delete.
